Reviews.Title: Big Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Kram
Reviews.Content: The laptop looks like a "made in China" knock off. I am totally disappointed. It overheats after a few minutes. The charging connector falls out with the slightest movement making work while charging very frustrating. Is this an HP product or is it an HP knock off because the finish is very poor.

ProductInfo.Features:
Bluetooth, Backlit Keyboard, Beats Audio, HDMI, Intel WiFi-N 2x2, 2 Year HP Warranty
1TB (1024GB) 5400RPM Hard Drive with HP ProtectSmart, 12GB DDR3L RAM
17.3 inch Ten Point Multi Touch Screen LED-backlit display, (1600 x 900)
2.4GHz/3.4GHz Quad Core Intel Core i7 Haswell CPU, Windows 8 64-Bit
Intel HD graphics 4600 (Up to 1792MB), SuperMulti DVD burner
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY TouchSmart 17 Quad Edition Notebook PC (Silver); Intel Core i7-4700MQ, 17.3" Multi-Touch Display, 1TB Hard Drive (1024GB), Backlit Keyboard & 12GB DDR3L RAM (LATEST MODEL); 17t-j000
